title: President to The Wall Street Journal: Opportunity for Sri Lanka as China’s labour costs rise
content: Rising labour costs in China present an opportunity for Sri Lanka to attract foreign companies seeking an alternative low-cost manufacturing base, President Mahinda Rajapaksa said in an interview with The Wall Street Journal published on September 22, 2010. President Rajapaksa, in New York for the United Nations General Assembly, told the newspaper that Sri Lanka…
